title: Sustainability Features
subtitle: Our Homes Combine Cutting Edge Sustainable Technology
With Luxurious Living

cards.title: Solar Energy Systems
cards.description: Advanced Photovotaic panels with 98% efficiency rating, integrated with Tesla powerwall storage. Reduces energy up to 80% annually while providing clean renewable power 24/7.

cards.title: Smart Home Integration
cards.description: AI-Powermode home management system that optimizes energy usage through predictive analytics. Features automated climate control, smart lighting, and real-time energy monitoring via mobile app.
